name: Medieval vs Synth
description:
Medieval vs Synths presents you the story of a King and his Wizard, who have fallen through time and found themselves into the distant future. A mysterious entity approaches them and explains that in order to go back, they must enter a deadly arena and emerge victorious.

The game offers multiple levels with an increasing difficulty. The King and Wizard require different playstyles and players must be careful not to fall victims to the synth enemies from the future. The death of either the King or Wizard means game over.
